answers.answer: When was the last time you took a deworm medicine?  And if it has been really long, then you can take that. You can also do some research upon excessive hunger and it's cure in nature through Ayurveda, etc. Natural products are always beneficial.
Hey thanks for your reply !! Yesturday i consult with a physician. He gave me worms medicine he said to take for 3 days!! And vitamin b tablet!!

question: Hey, it almost 4 months now , i have strange symptoms, excessive hunger and loose stool sometimes watery. Whatever i eat heavy meal or small meal i always feel hungry and my body shakes due to hunger but i control my self to npt to eat to much otherwise it will effect on my health, i thought may be its bulimia nervosa but m not purging or npt using any kind pills to loose weight infact i dont think about my weight or anything . I have only hunger problem.Can someone please help me to get rid of this problemMy thyroid , diabetes, cbc, liver function test, hiv  and igg test are normal, all test normal infact my whole body ct scan is normal.Please tell me is this related to harmonal imbalance or what.
title: Empty stomach after eating meal/ excessive hunger.
